modelCorrections.afterModification:
<html>` element is missing a "lang" attribute, which is necessary for defining the language of the content. This helps in accessibility, especially for screen readers, to ensure they use the correct language settings.

- Action: Add `lang="en"` (assuming English is the primary language of the content) to the `<html>` tag.

- Corrected HTML: `<html lang="en"><head></head><body></body></html>
